selection.text1: Who is going to use the app on this device?

profile.what_do: What do you want to do?
profile.name: Name

tips.text1: Take a look at the statistics of your patient/family member, to check their activity and how they improved over the days, weeks and months.
tips.text2: Hide boards the user does not need, so we only show what is important.
tips.text3: Use the history feature to see old sentences, what you did during the day, or tell stories.
tips.text4: Save pictograms and sentences in Favorites, so you can access them quickly.

mail.title: Ingrese el correo electrónico vinculado a la cuenta de OTTAA
mail.contact: *Asegurese de estar en contacto con la persona que posea este correo electrónico.
mail.warn: *Se enviará un mail de validación con un código para enlazar los pefiles.

token.title: Colocá el código de verificación que se muestra en la pantalla de la cuenta a vincular.

profile.title: Profiles screen
profile.subtitle: Who is using OTTAA today?
profile.description: With the profile selection, you will be able to use OTTAA from any device, keeping your pictograms and styles!

home.title: Customize your Home
home.subtitle: Shortcuts on main screen
home.description: Personaliza de acuerdo a los gustos y necesidades

customize.title: Customize your Home
customize.subtitle: We guide you in the learning process
customize.description: Activate or deactivate boards and pictograms to enhance the prediction, you have control.

terms.text:
To continue we need you to accept the terms & conditions.
See terms & conditions

link.title: Ingresá el correo electrónico de la cuenta de OTTAA a vincular
link.text1: *Asegurate de estar en contacto con la persona que tenga este correo electrónico.
link.text2: *Va a aparecer un código en la pantalla de la cuenta a vincular, copiá este código arriba.

token.title: Colocá el código de verificación que se muestra en la pantalla de la cuenta a vincular.

login.title: Ingresá con tu cuenta
login.register: Todavía no tenés cuenta? Registrate acá
